misuses.description: The encryption algorithm used in the encrypt method is broken. The MD5 algorithm is known to be vulnerable to collision attacks and should not be used for secure applications.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure and up-to-date encryption algorithm such as AES or RSA.

misuses.description: The MessageDigest class is used for hashing purposes, not encryption. The encrypt method should use a secure encryption algorithm such as AES or RSA instead of MD5.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure encryption algorithm and a secure implementation of the encryption function.
